title: Mindfulness Meditation-Integrated Educational Program for Emergency Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of first aid and experience in simulation training
context.additional_context: Team-based learning in digital device-supported emergency simulation environments. Effectiveness measured through simulation assessments after 4 weeks of mindfulness meditation pre-training

learning_goals: Learners can reduce anxiety levels by 20% during simulation training.
Learners can enhance decision-making accuracy in emergency scenarios by 30% through teamwork.
Learners can apply at least three mindfulness techniques to manage cognitive load.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
